author: The Telegraph
title: The Telegraph Festival of Business Agenda
text: Tuesday November 10th, 2015 8:00 Registration and Breakfast 9.00 Welcome Address from the Chair James Quinn Group Business Editor Telegraph Media Group Keynote Address Panel Session: The UK’s Evolving Role in Europe MODERATOR: Allister Heath Deputy Editor Telegraph Media Group Morning Break and Networking Morning Breakout Sessions Choose to attend one of four breakout sessions Breakout Option One: Business Disruptors Richard Joseph Founder Joseph Joseph MODERATOR: Rebecca Burn-Callander Enterprise Editor Telegraph Media Group Breakout Option Two: Export Beyond Europe MODERATOR: James Quinn Group Business Editor Telegraph Media Group Breakout Option Three: Valuing and Exiting your Business Tim Warrillow Founder Fever Tree MODERATOR: Ashley Armstrong Retail Correspondent Telegraph Media Group Breakout Option Four: How to be an Inspirational Leader Louis Saha Founder Axis Stars MODERATOR: Ben Marlow Deputy Business Editor Telegraph Media Group Panel Session: Entrepreneurship and Running a Successful Business Tony Pidgley CBE Group Chairman Berkeley Group Holdings MODERATOR : James Quinn Group Business Editor Telegraph Media Group Panel Session: Innovation and Product Development Networking Lunch Keynote Address Mark Price CVO Managing Director Waitrose Afternoon Breakout Sessions Choose to attend one of four breakout sessions Breakout Option One:
